vote.title: A public hearing, pursuant to Chapter 26 of the Texas Parks and Wildlife Code, to receive comments on the proposed use of a portion of parkland at Judge Charles R. Rose Community Park located at 3200 Simpson Stuart Road, totaling approximately 330,341 square feet (7.58 acres) of land, for three Sidewalk and Utility Easements, one Floodway Easement, one Water Easement, and one Right-of-way Easement for the Judge Charles R. Rose Community Park plat, as required by plat; and, at the close of the public hearing, consideration of a resolution authorizing the proposed use of parkland pursuant to Chapter 26 of the Texas Parks and Wildlife Code – Financing: No cost consideration to the City
